header.title: Introduction
header.content:
Base URL

The API is available under https://api.npms.io/v<version>. The current API version is 2.

New features, updates and changes are listed in the changelog. Additionally you should follow @npms_io for announcements.

Response format

All responses are JSON, including errors which have the following structure:

{
    code: 'INTERNAL',
    message: 'An internal error occurred'
}
